levels.description: View 4 random units from the Preparation Area and choose up to 2 to remove; give all Abyssal Hunter Operators on the battlefield their class's Tactical Equipment. If there are no Abyssal Operators on the battlefield, randomly deploy an Abyssal Hunter Operator from the Preparation Area instead. All enemies blocked by Abyssal Hunters within 20s become <$ba.stun>stunned</>.
